recipe.title: Tomato Sambal
ingredients: 2 large or 3 medium red tomatoes, seeded and diced
2 large or 3 medium yellow tomatoes, seeded and diced
Coarse sea salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Place the tomatoes and the chopped onion in a large serving bowl. Add the oil, vinegar, salt, pepper, and basil, toss well, and allow to rest at room temperature for up to 1 hour before serving.
